mapper.select: select pre_id,pre_name,address,longitude,latitude from t_ent_rent_user a LEFT JOIN v_prefecture b ON a.pre_id = b.id where start_time < NOW() and end_time > NOW() and user_id =#{0} GROUP BY pre_id

SELECT id as pre_id,name as pre_name,address,longitude,latitude,gateway FROM v_prefecture WHERE id IN
${id}

select a.pre_id as pre_id, a.stall_id as stall_id, a.stall_name as stall_name, max(a.plate) as plate, a.mobile as mobile, a.ent_id as ent_id, a.ent_pre_id as ent_pre_id, a.pre_name as pre_name, c.route_description, c.route_guidance, b.stall_local, b.status, b.lock_status, b.lock_sn, DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as start_time, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_time from t_ent_rent_user a left join v_stall b on a.stall_id = b.id left join v_prefecture c on a.pre_id = c.id where start_time < NOW() and end_time > NOW() and user_id =#{0} and (a.company_id is null or a.company_id in(select id from t_ent_rent_com t where status=2)) group by a.pre_id, a.stall_id , a.stall_name, a.mobile, a.ent_id , a.ent_pre_id , a.pre_name , c.route_description, c.route_guidance, b.stall_local, b.status, b.lock_status, b.lock_sn, DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT pre_id, stall_id, stall_name, mobile, ent_id , ent_pre_id, pre_name, route_description, route_guidance, stall_local, status, lock_status, lock_sn, start_time, end_time, plate FROM ( SELECT c.pre_id, cs.stall_id, cs.stall_name, cu.plate, u.mobile, c.id as ent_id , c.pre_id as ent_pre_id, c.pre_name, p.route_description, p.route_guidance, s.stall_local, s.status, s.lock_status, s.lock_sn, DATE_FORMAT(c.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as start_time, DATE_FORMAT(c.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_time FROM t_ent_rent_com c INNER JOIN t_ent_rent_com_stall cs ON c.id = cs.rent_com_id INNER JOIN v_stall s ON cs.stall_id = s.id INNER JOIN v_prefecture p ON s.pre_id = p.id INNER JOIN t_ent_rent_com_user cu ON c.id = cu.rent_com_id INNER JOIN v_vehicle_mark_manage m ON cu.plate = m.veh_mark INNER JOIN t_user u ON u.id = m.veh_user_id and u.id = #{0} WHERE u.id IS NOT NULL AND c.status = '2' AND NOW() between c.start_time AND c.end_time
UNION
SELECT ru.pre_id, ru.stall_id, ru.stall_name, ru.plate, tu.mobile, null as ent_id, p.id as ent_pre_id, ru.pre_name, p.route_description, p.route_guidance, s.stall_local, s.status, s.lock_status, s.lock_sn, DATE_FORMAT(ru.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as start_time, DATE_FORMAT(ru.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_time FROM v_vehicle_mark_manage vm INNER JOIN t_ent_rent_user ru on vm.veh_mark =ru.plate and ru.type =0 INNER JOIN v_stall s ON ru.stall_id = s.id INNER JOIN v_prefecture p ON s.pre_id = p.id INNER JOIN t_user tu on tu.id = vm.veh_user_id and tu.id= #{0} WHERE NOW() BETWEEN ru.start_time and ru.end_time UNION
SELECT ru.pre_id, ru.stall_id, ru.stall_name, ru.plate, tu.mobile, null as ent_id, p.id as ent_pre_id, ru.pre_name, p.route_description, p.route_guidance, s.stall_local, s.status, s.lock_status, s.lock_sn, DATE_FORMAT(ru.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as start_time, DATE_FORMAT(ru.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_time FROM v_vehicle_mark_manage vm INNER JOIN t_ent_rent_user ru on vm.veh_mark =ru.plate and ru.type =1 INNER JOIN v_stall s ON ru.stall_id = s.id INNER JOIN v_prefecture p ON s.pre_id = p.id INNER JOIN t_user tu on tu.id = vm.veh_user_id and tu.id= #{0} WHERE ru.company_id is null and now() BETWEEN ru.start_time and ru.end_time ) t GROUP BY pre_id, stall_id, stall_name, mobile, ent_id , ent_pre_id, pre_name, route_description, route_guidance, stall_local, status, lock_status, lock_sn, start_time, end_time, plate
